transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. Haan, good morning sir, main Akanksha IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hoon. Kaise hain sir?

Customer: Bas badhiya badhiya.

Executive: Sir, woh na Airtel ke app se matlab Airtel app ke network se toh chal raha tha Jio ke side se issue tha toh woh abhi resolve ho gaya. Aap bhi abhi app login karke dekh sakte hain, aapka app chal raha hoga IndiaMART ka.

Customer: Woh Jio ke network se issue tha sir.

Executive: Maine aapko WhatsApp pe bhi dal diya tha.

Executive: Aapne aaj ke date pe login nahi kiya na abhi?

Customer: Kal login nahi nahi main Chrome se use kar raha hoon kyunki problem thi toh.

Executive: Hmm, abhi chal raha hai ek baar dekhiye mujhe mail aaya hua tha.

Customer: Bas abhi yeh open ho gaya hai. Ek minute mein pata chal jayega.

(silence)

Customer: Haan chal gaya hai.

Executive: Chal raha hai sir?

Customer: Haan, abhi toh lag raha hai ki achcha hi chal raha hai.

Executive: Haan.

Executive: Baki sir aapke na catalog mein ek toh low score wale jo products hai na please us pe kaam kar lena hum time to time nikal ke woh gym dieting nutrition services aap dete hain na toh usme ek photo missing hai woh ek photo update kar dijiyega. Theek hai? Aur walnut Kashmir jo dala hua hai, theek hai yeh walnut oil hai na walnut oil Kashmir sorry haan. Toh ek isme bhi photo teen photo nahi hai, theek hai? Aur Kashmir almond oil ke do product dale hue hain sir, do bari dala hua hai. Ek toh 700 per kg aur ek 1650 per kg.

Customer: Yeh yeh kisi manager kisi ne nahi dala hoga maine toh do baar nahi dale the.

Executive: Yeh matlab ek delete kar doon sir? Dono ek hi hai? 700 per kg rakhna hai ya 1650 per kg rakhna hai?

Customer: Hame inko na khud hi dekhne delete kar dunga kis cheez ko nahi rakhna.

Executive: Theek hai aur ek honey dry fruits wala ek jo dala hua hai isme bhi teen photo nahi hai aur jafrani mitti jo dala hua hai, theek hai isme yeh tea mixture aur masala tea pre mix pe kis mein add karu yeh category? Masala tea ya tea pre mix? Har kisi ke teen photo hone chahiye.

Executive: Haan, kyunki teen photo rahega toh score aapka badhega.

Customer: Achcha achcha achcha theek theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai aur dusra jo hai ek jo blueberry sir dala hua hai yeh frozen blueberry hai, dry hai ya fresh blueberry kya hai yeh? Dry blueberry hai ya frozen?

Customer: Dry blueberry.

Executive: Theek hai isme bhi ek hi photo dala hua hai toh isme teen photo required hoga. Theek hai aur ladakhi apricot jo dala hua hai yeh dry hai?

Customer: Ladakhi apricot? Yeh dry hai.

Executive: Haan dry.

Executive: Theek hai isme bhi photo missing hai yeh update kar lena aur cranberries jo dale hue hain yeh dried cranberries hai ya cranberry extract hai ya fresh cranberries hai?

Customer: Dry dry main in sabko na update kar deta hoon abhi main shop pe hi hoon main saman utha ke photo leke abhi kar deta hoon.

Executive: Theek hai yeh aap update kar lena baki aapke catalog mein na PDF ka brochure available nahi hai woh aapke pass hai toh bataiye main add kar dungi hai catalog ka PDF ka brochure?

Customer: PDF? Haan PDF ka document.

Customer: PDF nahi banaya maine banaunga.

Executive: Videos wagera kahin dalte hain aap phone se bana ke YouTube Instagram Facebook kahin pe?

Customer: Nahi nahi.

Executive: Theek hai agar phone se bana ke aap upload kar sakte hain toh uska link hame provide kar dijiyega. Baki aapke catalog mein ek hi by lead ek hi keyword hai jiska by lead aap sabse jyada consume kar rahe hain saffron bulbs ka. Theek hai walnut walnut kernels ho gaya Kashmiri saffron ho gaya inke by leads aap bahut kam consume kar rahe hain toh aap ek kaam kariyega by leads mein upar jo search box hota hai na waha pe keyword dal ke keyword search karke uska ek ek by lead bhi purchase karoge toh usko inquiries aana chalu ho jayega. Jaise dry fruit honey aap deal karte ho iska ek by lead bhi purchase hua hai toh yeh keyword by lead ke upar search box mein daloge na leads aana chalu ho jayega aur aap ek do bhi consume karoge leads lead aana chalu ho jayega. Theek hai? Baki yeh ticket main close kar rahi hoon jo aapne open kiya tha. Theek hai aapko ek rating ka link aayega usse mujhe rate kar dijiyega theek hai aapko WhatsApp

Customer: Okay okay. Email mein bhejiye ga WhatsApp nahi mera chalta.

Executive: Aapka aapke registered is number pe WhatsApp hai nahi na isi pe jayega waise toh aap ek baar mail bhi check kar lena.

Customer: Mail mail kar dijiyega main waha de dunga.

Executive: Theek hai okay. Thank you.

Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART app was not working.

- Multiple products missing photos in catalog.

- Duplicate product listings in catalog.

- Needs clarification on product categories.

- Low consumption of buyleads for certain keywords.



Resolution:

- App issue resolved; customer confirmed it's working.

- Executive provided details on missing photos.

- Executive offered to delete duplicate product listings.

- Executive suggested keywords for better buylead consumption.

- Executive will close the open ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update product photos.

- Customer will create PDF brochure.

- Executive will send rating link via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app, catalog, photos, buyleads, products
